name: Laserium
description: You play as a bold ball that needs to run through all the hi-tech security systems. Bumping into the security bots means death, same does a fall from too high. Collect health points and look for finish blocks to go to the next level.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: DualCore Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: any Storage: 10 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 50 MB available space
